attributes.title: terrible app😤
attributes.review: it’s kept on glitching and wouldn’t open. it spammed my phone with messages for events over and over too. i recommend just getting rid of the app completely.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I wish 0 stars were an option. This app supports a racist, misogynist, homophobic, and child rapist. That’s disgusting.

attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app took hours to download, drained my battery twice, and told me to buy trump merch. i’m sorry i don’t buy TRASH.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: i have never had such a bad app in MY LIFE. the app told me to kill my self🙄🧚🏽. i can’t believe this app 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: I am filled with disappointment for this app as well as the President.

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: Awful just horrible I really don’t have any word for it .

attributes.title: absolutely horrible
attributes.review: this app is incredibly confusing and developed very badly. when i opened the app, i was met with these very big words. extremely offensive. no thank you, i will never redownload this app ever again.

attributes.title: Stole my dog?
attributes.review: This app made me turn to a life of drugs and alcohol. I now get the sudden urge to lick Cheeto dust off of corn husks to feel the sensation of being close to agent orange.

attributes.title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME!!!!
attributes.review: Never even opened on my phone and I have the newest iPhone 11 so the app doesn’t even work!
